$.insuFloor: Tu não tens Rubines suficientes. Precisas de pelo menos **{{number}}** {{emoji}}
$.noFunds: Eu acho que não tens dinheiro para esta aposta... Tu tens {{number}} Rubines
$.dailyGet: {{emoji}} Recebeste 100 Rubines do teu bónus diário~
$.dailyNope: {{emoji}} Ei! Tu já resgataste o teu bónus diário, tempo restante para o próximo: **{{remaining}}**
$.dailyStreak: {{emoji}} Tu ganhaste mais 500 rubines por os coletares 10 dias seguidos!
$.goodDrop: Pessoal! Um Rubine {{emoji}} está no chão! Quem escrever `{{prefix}}pick` primeiro fica com ele!
$.rareDrop: CUM CARALHO! Um baú inteiro de Rubines {{emoji}}! Escreve `{{prefix}}pick` e leva TUDO!
$.userDrop: {{user}} deixou cair **{{amt}}x** Rubines {{emoji}} no canal! Escreve `{{prefix}}pick` e leva!
$.cantDrop: Acho que não tens Rubines para deixares cair...

forFun.saltLVL: O nível de sal de {{target}} é **{{amount}}%** {{emoji}}
forFun.booru404: Oops, não encontrei nada com essas tags. Vê se tu tens tudo certo, querido!
forFun.nsfw404: Puto, o teu porno é tão bizarro que eu não encontrei isso em lado nenhum. Tenta algo menos estranho
forFun.nsfwNope: :no_entry_sign: Comandos NSFW não são permitidos aqui, querido! Pede ao Admin por permissões!
forFun.nsfwNofunds: Não tens Rubines para comprar coisas marotas. Dá-me **5**Rubines e depois falamos. Ganha Rubines com `{{prefix}}daily`
forFun.airwaifu: :airplane: Esta Aerowaifu foi cuidadosamente escolhida por ti.
forFun.leadUnap: Se não te vês aqui, escreve `{{prefix}}profile` para veres o teu nível. Talvez tu és podre mesmo.

misc.aviOK: Oki-doki, a minha nova foto é esta. Tu podes mudar a minha foto outra vez em {{cooldown}}

CMD.denied: Não estás autorizado a usar isto. Este comando requer um rank elevado a {{rankNeed}}, o teu rank é {{rankMe}}. Contacta o dono do servidor ou um Mod.
CMD.incorrectUsage: Oh, não não, não é assim que tu usas este comando, usa-o assim: {{usage}}. Ex.: {{example}}
CMD.disabledModule: :no_entry_sign: O nosso mestre declarou {{module}} proibido aqui. Ora bolas.
CMD.prefixChng: Oh well, now my prefix is {{prefix}}, try it out using `{{prefix}}stats`.
CMD.moderationNeeded: You can't use this command, you need either **Manage Server** perms, or set a Modrole. Set a Modrole using `{{prefix}}modrole [Role]`
CMD.noDM: My bad, i can't respond to this command via DM
CMD.disabledChn: The {{module}} module has been disabled in the channel #{{channel}}
CMD.disabledComChn: The **{{command}}** command has been disabled in the channel #{{channel}}
CMD.enabledChn: The **{{module}}** module has been enabled in the channel #{{channel}}
CMD.enabledComChn: The **{{command}}** command   has been enabled in the channel #{{channel}}
CMD.kinNone: first things first, tell me the name of the guy i be kickin'. Before I kick you instead.
CMD.kin404: whoopsie, I think I cannot find this guy :< Isn't he already gone? Does he even exist? Ain't your imagination? YOU SURE???
CMD.unperm: For some hell of a reason I got no perms to do this. GIMME PERMS GODAMMIT
CMD.modroleunAdded: Role **{{role}}** is no more a Modrole. Are you atempting a coup?
CMD.noRoleHere: This Role is not in the list. Double-check your shit, please.
CMD.noRolesGiven: No Role was mentioned, are you doing it right?
CMD.roleAdded: Hell yea! Role Added, everything is in place~ ! :heart:
CMD.roleAlreadyHere: Hey, mister, this Role is already here!
CMD.nosuchrole: Um, I couldn't find this role, type its name exactly! Case-sensitive and shit.
CMD.incinerate: I've just set fire into {{amt}} Messages! If you don't like it i'll burn {{amtB}} next time.
CMD.roleadCom: Yo! Now **{{user}}** is included in the **{{group}}** group! WELCOME TO THE BOAT!
CMD.rolermCom: Well, **{{user}}** is no longer part of the **{{group}}** group! I wonder why.
CMD.banNone: Tell me in whose ass i'm gonna shove this hammer, before I do it at yours!
CMD.didban:
:hammer: Banned the hell out of {{target}} from here. 
 **Reason:** *{{reason}}*

builds.genProf: Hold on, generating your super duper ProfileCard thingy...

help.checkYeDM: Psst! I sent you some stuffz in DM, give it a look.
help.announce: Announces something in the #general Channel (or equivalent, you get it)
help.balance: Your balance of expenses and earnings of rubines. What have you been spending shit on.
help.drop: Drops a Rubine somewhere for someone to pick
help.flip: Heads or Tails, and that's it. Just don't get bankrupt, I don't work with loans.
help.joined: Gives you the date that you or @someguy joined the Server
help.kick: Kicks @someguy, as it says in the tin
help.personalTxt: Set a personal text for your Profile Card
help.pick: Loot the goods scattered by the channel
help.prefixSet: Define a new prefix for my commands.
help.joinSupp: Join my Support Server for reporting bugs and suggesting feats
help.disableNuisance:
Disable Annoying responses:
 Goodies/Rubines: ${message.prefix}disable DROPS 
  Level Up: ${message.prefix}disable LVUP
help.help: You probably know what this does
help.speak or lang: Change the language I speak, currently Available: `{{langs}}`

menu.goaway: Since I have stuff to do. I'm gonna look around while you decide. Call me again when you're done.
menu.chargeB: from your account. I'll be back in a minute with your order! Okay~ ?

nuke.confirm:
:radioactive: **__This will reset all server-specific settings, including:__**
```
 -Prefix
 -ModRoles
 -Enabled/Disabled Commands and Modules
 -Drops of Rubines will be turned OFF
 -LevelUp Messages will be turned ON
 -Custom Reactions will be wiped 
 -Log Channels
```
 -This nuke will be notified in my Support Server. For everyone to see how much you fucked up. 
 -You will be unable to Nuke for 48 hours if you abuse this command I decide whether you're abusing or not. Recurring abuse and I block the command at this server.


 **Do you really wish me to send nukes?** 
 send **ok** for yes, **c** for cancel.
nuke.confirmB:
**Write the nuke reason below to confirm**
 Send **c** for cancel.
nuke.completed: Server Info has been successfully wiped and reset. Try using **+serverinfo** to see if everything was properly reset. I'm no responsible for any afterward Nuclear Fallout contamination.

greet.byeOFF:
Bye Message disabled! Say bye to bye. Got it? 
Bye...
to **Bye**
Hahahah... haha.. oh, well, it's gone. Thank you!
greet.byeON: Bye Message enabled in this channel! Even though they aren't going to see it, at least I'm polite to bid farewell.
greet.helloOFF: Welcome Message disabled! That's not nice to not greet your guests. :X
greet.helloON: Welcome Message enabled in this channel! I'll be sure that everyone receives a happy HELLO in their faces as soon as they join~ !

reput.noSelf: Hey hey smart ass! You cannot rep yourself!
reput.noTarget: Tell me who to +Rep, unless you're Repping the vacuum.
reput.confirm: :fleur_de_lis:  **{{who}}** has kindly added **+1Rep** to **{{target}}**. How sweet~
reput.cooldown: Hold up dude! You can rep again in {{remaining}}. Be patient.
